about_the_game:
FREAK☆NINJA WARS

A single-player deck builder game where you control yokai to defeat other yokai. Utilize the system of roguelike and card game, using special moves powered by Yokai energy to conquer dungeons.

About the trial version

In the trial version, you can control three types of hero characters included in the product version. In addition, you can play for free with basic battle logic and a gentle level dungeon. It also contains one type of adult event as adult content.

Feature Introduction

Controlling Yokai: As the scenario progresses, players can make yokai, ninjas, gods, etc. as their allies.

Allies that have become yokai can be sent to the dungeon and can fight. Yokai that have become allies each have their own characteristics and special moves, greatly changing the style of combat.



In the dungeon, you can buy items at the shop or sell cards.

Deck composition and dungeons: Players can build decks by capturing dungeons. In addition to cards, items, money, and equipment will appear when you win. Aim to subdue the dungeon boss with a powerful deck composition.

Sexual and Violent Expressions

This game includes anime-style blood spatter expressions, drinking, nipple depiction, and processed female genitalia depiction.
